Observed at: Bow Valley 4:00 AM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to snow this evening and ending near midnight then clearing. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Snow level 1600 metres lowering to valley bottom this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening then 40 percent chance of flurries late in the evening. Snow level 1700 metres lowering to valley bottom in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
